thread.title_full: Extremely good experience - Review of Apex City of London Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: RockingrodNorwich
title: Extremely good experience - Review
text:
We stayed here for one night and ate lunch in the restaurant.
The hotel is very well maintained, with a decent gym and we thought the lunch was exceptional. Hannah and Aaron in the restaurant were so attentive and the food was delicious.
A tip is to book direct as you will receive a Â£10 money off voucher and I couldn't have got a better deal through any booking sites.
Location can't be beat for Tower Of London, Embankment area.
We will definitely be back.
